import profileImagePath from "../images/profile__image.jpg"; import profileImageAfterPath from "../images/profile__image_after.svg"; import React from 'react'; import PopupWithForm from "./PopupWithForm"; function Main() { const [isEditProfilePopupOpen, setIsEditProfilePopupOpen] = React.useState(false); let popupWithForm = const test = () => { alert('SWAAAAAG'); setIsEditProfilePopupOpen(true); } return (
{popupWithForm}
{test()}}>
